meanings.definition: Sebums: oily secretion of the sebaceous glands
meanings.sent1: My skin produces sebums to keep it moisturized.
meanings.sent2: The sebums on my face help protect it from drying out.
meanings.sent3: The sebums on my nose decided to throw a party and invite all the other oils.
meanings.sent4: Her hair glistened in the sun, as if coated with sebums of gold.
meanings.sent5: The sebums felt like a shield, guarding my skin from the harsh weather.
